devdoc.details: ERC721 token that can be minted by holding a specific ZK Badge

_mintSismoBadge(((uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Mint badges from sismoProof received by "Prove With Sismo" off-chain flow

params.attester: Attester address (default = HYDRA_S1_ACCOUNTBOUND_ATTESTER, see the next function)

returns._0: Address of the owner of the badges, tokenIds of the badges minted and levels of the badges minted

claim().details: Mints a NFT and transfers it to the account that holds the ZK Badge

claimTo(address).details: Mints a NFT and transfers it to the account that holds the ZK Badge

params.to: address of the account that will receive the NFT

claimWithSismo(((uint256,uint256,bytes)[.details: Mints a ZK Badge and a NFT and transfers it to the account that holds the newly minted ZK Badge

params.request: user request containing the data needed to mint the ZK Badge
params.sismoProof: Proof of eligibilty to mint the ZK Badge

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers a NFT to the account that holds the ZK Badge with the same nullifier

params.from: address of the account that currently owns the NFT
params.to: address of the account that will receive the NFT (must hold a ZK Badge with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID)
params.tokenId: id of the NFT to transfer

transferWithSismo(address,address,uint25.details: Transfers a NFT to the account that holds the ZK Badge with the same nullifier

params.from: address of the account that currently owns the NFT
params.request: user request containing the data needed to mint the ZK Badge
params.sismoProof: Proof of eligibilty to mint the ZK Badge
params.to: address of the account that will receive the NFT (the address will also receive a ZK Badge with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID)
params.tokenId: id of the NFT to transfer

devdoc.title: ZkBadgeboundERC721

_mintSismoBadge(((uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: This function will use the default attester (HYDRA_S1_ACCOUNTBOUND_ATTESTER) if no attester is specified.

claim().notice: The account that calls this function must hold a ZK Badge with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID

claimTo(address).notice: The address `to` must hold a ZK Badge with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: The address `to` must hold a ZK Badge with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID

transferWithSismo(address,address,uint25.notice: The address `to` will receive a ZK Badge and a NFT with the id MERGOOOR_PASS_BADGE_ID that is linked to the same nullifier

userdoc.notice: This implementation offers to any account holding a specific ZK Badge the possibility to mint a NFT and transfer it to another account The ZK Badge used in this implementation is bounded to an account thanks to a nullifier (in a zero knowledge way) The nullifier is a cryptographic information that prevents any account from producing a proof for the same ZK Badge twice We use the nullifier in this contract to make sure that each NFT minted or transfered is linked with a 1-o-1 relationship to a specific ZK Badge and therefore to a specific account To ensure this feature, we use the nullifier as the tokenId of the NFT that is minted or transferred Each time a NFT is minted or transferred, we make sure that the ZK Badge owned by the account is the same as the one used to mint or transfer the NFT
